"It is a great honor to invite you here for the 40th" Singapore Conference "" @fhollande
"Singapore is an excellent partner for France, it is an ally" @fhollande #ISEAS
"You have confidence in openness, ability to be fully in the world" @fhollande #ISEAS https://t.co/i3nHwofwJw
"You have made the choice of technology Singapore is a global reference of the smart city" @fhollande #ISEAS
"You are a country that attracts talent" @fhollande #ISEAS
"France wants to be an open country, innovative, anxious to give a place to its youth" @fhollande #ISEAS
"The temptation of withdrawal is dangerous, a stalemate We must defend simple principles: independence, respect" @fhollande
"We are in a world of uncertainties and threats" @fhollande #ISEAS
"The fight against terrorism requires more cooperation between states and institutions" @fhollande #ISEAS
"We must use the weapons of technology, cyber security and cyber defense are a priority to protect ourselves" @fhollande
"As President of the Republic, I have been careful to preserve unity to prevent terrorists cause division" @fhollande
"We are in a war that will last a long time.It needs action carried out with the necessary scale, on a global scale" @fhollande
"The temptation of withdrawal can affect great democracies" @fhollande #ISEAS
"We must show another way of doing things: Regulated globalization based on sovereignty and international organizations"
"All the global growth of the last sixty years has been allowed by free trade" @fhollande #ISEAS
"There is always a trace, an origin Protectionism is as old as trade" @fhollande #ISEAS
"We must show that respect for an international order is the best solution" @fhollande #ISEAS
"We have signed an agreement with Iran on nuclear and we know that there is also a will in North Korea" #ISEAS @fhollande
"I want to finish on one last threat: climate change" @fhollande #ISEAS
"Many countries in Asia are exposed to global warming: Bangladesh, Vietnam, ... face these risks it is necessary to invest" @fhollande

"We must guarantee together the Paris agreement" @fhollande #ISEAS

"I have come to deliver a message of lucidity and will." @fhollande #ISEAS
"Our exchanges with Singapore have doubled in 10 years and we intend to give French technology its place in Asia" @fhollande

"France to this capacity for invention, innovation and freedom We carry universal values" @fhollande #ISEAS
